name: Inetium
overview: Inetium provides technology consulting services to both mid-sized and large organizations throughout the United States. Inetium is committed to increasing people and organizational productivity by providing IT planning services, customer relationship management (CRM), business productivity, IT infrastructure, creative services and web strategies.

milestones.source_text:
MINNEAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Inetium is pleased to announce its recent acceptance as a Microsoft Silverlight Partner. Microsoft Silverlight is a powerful development platform for creating engaging, interactive user experiences for Web, desktop, and mobile applications when online or offline.

To become a Microsoft Silverlight Partner, Inetium was required to demonstrate how it uses Silverlight to meet its customersâ€™ needs, create a Silverlight-based landing page on the Inetium Web site, and feature Silverlight products for new offerings. Additionally, partners must have an exceptional skill-level with the Silverlight development.

Most recently, Inetium used Silverlight to produce the new Microsoft portal Partner Sales Resources (www.partnersalesresources.com). Inetium was able to create a single location that serves as a launching point for partners to get anywhere in the Microsoft eco-system, thus saving time as well as enriching their experience.

As a Microsoft Gold certified partner, Inetium is extremely proud to partner with Microsoft on Silverlight in addition to other software development areas. â€œWe are very excited about our Silverlight partnership,â€ says Eric Raarup, Inetiumâ€™s Vice President of Technology and Marketing. â€œSilverlight is a key enabling technology that allows Inetium to deliver highly interactive solutions that both integrate with data and create dynamic user experiences.â€

Silverlight 4 will be launched at Microsoftâ€™s DevConnections/ASP.NET and Silverlight Conference and Expo in Las Vegas, April 12-14, 2010.

About Inetium
Inetium, www.inetium.com, is an award-winning Microsoft Gold Certified partner. The company was incorporated in 1998 and currently employs nearly 90 people. Headquartered in Bloomington, Minnesota, Inetium provides technology consulting services to both mid-sized and large organizations throughout the United States. Inetium is committed to increasing people and organizational productivity by providing IT planning services, customer relationship management (CRM), business productivity, IT infrastructure, creative services and web strategies. Inetium maximizes the value of its customersâ€™ technology investments by helping them properly align their business and technology goals.
milestones.source_description: INETIUM ANNOUNCES PARTNERSHIP WITH MICROSOFT SILVERLIGHT
